name: IVMetronidazole
title: IV Metronidazole
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values includes select antibiotics that are used in an inpatient setting for surgical prophylaxis.  This antibiotic is Metronidazole only.  These are not dose specific, however, they must only be given intravenously.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who are on prophylactic antibiotics prior to surgery consistent with current guidelines.  Using the Quality Data Model, this element will map to the Medication category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes which represent Metronidazole antibiotics which are given intravenously.  Codes used are to be RxNorm codes only.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)
